TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted you get caught on the way out and executed

i wish that i had a more original name

Granted, but I hunt you down and assassinate you for having a more original name than mine.

I wish that everyone was deported to Kerbin.

Granted, You are included in everyone and promptly get blown up by a SRB

I wish Mguarn would stop Necromancing.

Granted, but now dead bodies are rising from the Earth. Turns out there's a minimun of necromaning needed in the world. Who knew?

I wish my parents wouldn't try to watch tv in the same room I'm in...

Granted, they tried and failed.

I wish for someone to tell me what Bloc is in English.

Granted. they can only express it in dutch and have seizures when trying to explain it in english.

I wish for vodka

Granted ,but it filled with snake venom.

I wish for a muffin.

Granted. but it's full of vodka

I wish for an incorruptible liver.

Granted, but it is fed with fully corruptible fluids.

I wish that SCP-173 was my best friend.

Granted. he..."Hugs" you

I wish I could get that out of my mind

Granted, but then it eats you.

I wish people'd stop sniping.

Granted. They stop for exactly one minute, 45 seconds, 62 milliseconds, and 5 nanoseconds

I wish That THE NUMBERS didn't happen in IRC

Granted, but it turned into filthy FILTHY ERP (wait, is that a bad thing?)

I wish I could be certain.

Granted. After a...painful (and that's an understatement) ERP. you are now certain.

I wish that thought never entered my brain

Granted ,but your are uncertain.

I wish for a muffin.

Granted. You die before you can eat it

I wish I was free to act on impulse in one specific case.

Granted ,but thats when you meet a new friend sadly.

I wish for a muffin that has the ability to open portals to new dimensions.

Granted, but the first dimension it opens up is that one from Event Horizon.

I wish for a sweater that DOESN'T have ads or company markings on it. Like really, it's impossible to find those these days!

Granted ,but it blank ,and it is radioactive.

I wish for muffins for everyone except me.

Granted, but we feel sorry for your lack of muffins and throw them at you so you can also have some of them. This has the unfortunate side-effect of you being suffocated under a giant pile of muffins.

I wish that I could play Bioshock: Infinite for an infinite amount of time.

granted you still need food

i wish everyone other then me and my family and friends turned into a muffin that i could eat

Granted but you cant eat them

i wish i cod be a pro modder

Granted, but you need to pass English grammar first

I wish for a double bacon cheeseburger with everything and a 2-liter of coke.

Granted, but everything is 12 years old

I wish for a tree in my garden.

Granted, but said tree is evil. Picture the whomping willow, or that one poisoned one from Fern Gully.

I wish I could get good marks on my exams this week.
